suggestions.recommendedDataStructure: Use Set or Map depending on logic
suggestions.why: Manual scanning inside loop is slow (O(n)). Hashed lookup is O(1).
suggestions.energyImpact: Reduces unnecessary CPU usage and energy waste.

suggestions.pattern: Array used as dictionary with string key
suggestions.why: Arrays only support numeric indexing. Using them like maps is incorrect.
suggestions.energyImpact: Using maps gives consistent O(1) lookup.
